trunk/src/wave/util/except.h

00001 #ifndef _except_h
00002 #define _except_h
00003 
00004 static class ExceptInit {
00005 public:
00006         ExceptInit(void);
00007         ~ExceptInit(void);
00008 
00009 private:
00010         static int init_count;
00011         static void (*old_new_handler)();
00012         static void (*old_terminate_handler)();
00013 } except_init;
00014 
00015 // NOTE:  The __SUNPRO_CC == 0x510 compiler (e.g., at IMPA as of 10/2002)
00016 // has exceptions, but it also defines an incompatible exception structure
00017 // in math.h.  It does have the header file rw/math.h (from Rogue Wave) that
00018 // uses "#define exception math_exception" to try to get around this problem,
00019 // but to take advantage of this would require changing every math.h in the
00020 // code to rw/math.h.
00021 
00022 #if (defined(__GNUC__) \
00023         && ((__GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 91) || __GNUC__ >= 3)) \
00024         || (defined(__SUNPRO_CC) && __SUNPRO_CC >= 0x520)
00025 #define except_h_HAS_EXCEPTIONS
00026 #else
00027 #undef except_h_HAS_EXCEPTIONS
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #ifdef except_h_HAS_EXCEPTIONS
00031 
00032 #include <exception>
00033 
00034 #if defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ >= 3
00035 using std::exception;
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #define THROW(except)   throw except
00039 
00040 #else /* except_h_HAS_EXCEPTIONS */
00041 
00042 #include <stdlib.h>
00043 #include <iostream>
00044 
00045 #if defined(__SUNPRO_CC) && __SUNPRO_CC <= 0x420
00046 // struct exception is defined in math.h
00047 #include <math.h>
00048 #else
00049 class exception {};
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #ifdef __STDC__
00053 
00054 #define THROW(except) \
00055  (cerr << "Run-time exception error; current exception: " \
00056   #except "\n\tNo handler for exception." << endl, abort(), 0)
00057 
00058 #else // SUN C++ 1.0 does not have an ANSI preprocessor!?
00059 
00060 #define THROW(except) \
00061  (cerr << "Run-time exception error:\n\tNo handler for exception." << endl, \
00062   abort(), 0)
00063 
00064 #endif /* __STDC__ */
00065 
00066 #endif /* except_h_HAS_EXCEPTIONS */
00067 
00068 #endif /* _except_h */
